data.title: LUCAS Soil Survey Portal (Eurostat)
data.description: Official Eurostat portal to download raw micro-data files for each survey year and country in CSV format.

data.title: LUCAS Topsoil 2018 (ESDAC)
data.description: Fill request form to download the LUCAS 2018 topsoil dataset

data.title: LUCAS primaryData (ESDAC)
data.description: To download the photos, please consult our LUCAS photo section.

data.description: To download the photos, please consult our LUCAS photo section.

data.title: Harmonized THLOC Points (Google Earth Engine)
data.description: Harmonized LUCAS theoretical-location (THLOC) point dataset (2006â€“2018) accessible via the Google Earth Engine Data Catalog.

data.title: LUCAS 2015 Topsoil API (API Store)
data.description: REST-style API providing programmatic access to LUCAS 2015 topsoil micro-data via the Apitalks Open Data Marketplace.

data.title: LUC Historical Land Cover/Land Use (ArcGIS)
data.description: ArcGIS Online item for downloading point-based environmental parameters from the LUCAS 2012 survey.

data.title: Open Geospatial Harmonization System (MDPI article)
data.description: Describes the ST_LUCAS system components and Python package for in-situ LUCAS data harmonization, including a WFS API interface.

data.title: LUCAS Micro-data by Country (Eurostat Archives)
data.description: CSV downloads of LUCAS micro-data for each EU Member State and survey year (2006â€“2018) from the Eurostat open data repository.

data.title: LUCAS Soil Harmonized Dataset (Nature Scientific Data)
data.description: Peer-reviewed paper and links for downloading the harmonized LUCAS Soil dataset (2009â€“2018) and documentation.
